name: Cliff House - Silver Frame - Blue Hawaii Polarized Lens

features:
Frame: Silver
Lens: Blue Hawaii - (BEST IN BRIGHT, DIRECT SUNLIGHT) Our blue mirror coating provides a stylish new look that offers the same amazing colour enhancement and clarity as all other Maui Jim lenses.
Lens Material: MauiPure Our most popular lens material. It combines optics almost as crisp as SuperThin Glass with ultra lightweight and excellent scratch and shatter resistance.
Shape: Modified aviator frame complements smaller to medium faces.
Bridge: A double bridge design with adjustable, non-slip silicone nose pads
Fit: (eye) 59, (bridge) 15, (temple) 120, 6 base curve
Finishing Treatment: Gloss finish for a sleek look
Material: Pure titanium frame is lightweight, durable and comfortable.
Hinge: Anti-corrosive traditional hinge
